Question: This person died in his home on 5 December 1791(1791-12-05) (aged 35) at 1:00 am.
Hints: This person no longer borrowed large sums from Puchberg, and made a start on paying off his debts.
This person also wrote scatological music, a series of canons that he sang with his friends.
The central traits of the Classical style are all present in this person's music.
